attributes.action: change the terms of the Iraqi war inquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A public inquiry is the only way that British public will accept that the government is being open and transparent. I feel that the claim that this will compromise national security is absurd and only gives the impression that the government is being less then candid.

The Prime Minister has a duty to the country to identify the real reasons for going to war with Iraq, and to expose those that are culpable in taking us into a war where the reasons given have been found to be suspect, and at a cost of tens of thousands of lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
